settings.supportEmailText: Ukuba unemibuzo okanye ufuna uncedo, nceda uthumele i-imeyile ku

home.step1: Inyathelo 1: Nika iinkcukacha zendalo â€“ sebenzisa i-GPS okanye ubhale ngesandla.
home.step2: Inyathelo 2: Yongeza inkcazelo kwaye unamathele isithombe sodoti.
home.step3: Inyathelo 3: Cofa i-Upload Post. Usenzile inxaxheba yakho yokugcina iplanethi icocekile!

communityDropdown.errorUnableToRetrieve: Ayikwazi ukufumana indawo yakho. Nceda ufake ngezandla.

faqs.question: Ungabika njani ukulahleka kwamadoti?
faqs.answer: Ungabika isiganeko sokulahleka kwamadoti ngokuvakasha kwiphepha le 'Bika' kwiDumpWatch.

faqs.question: Kutheni ngiyibhale ingxelo?
faqs.answer: Emva kokuba ingxelo ibhaliwe, iya kufumaneka kuwo onke amalungu omphakathi, kwaye abasebenzisi ababhalisiweyo bayakwazi ukuyibona nokuthatha inxaxheba.

faqs.question: Ngubani onokubona imibhali yam kunye neengxelo?
faqs.answer: Imibhali kunye neengxelo zakho zibonakala kuwo onke amalungu omphakathi okhethiweyo, kwaye nakwabanye abasebenzisi ababhalisiweyo.

faqs.question: Ndingayicima na imibhali yam kunye neengxelo?
faqs.answer: Hayi, amandla okucima imibhali kunye neengxelo aza kufakwa kwixesha elizayo.

faqs.question: Ndijongene nengxaki nenkqubo, ndingawafumana njani amalungiselelo?
faqs.answer: Naziphi na iimpendulo okanye imibuzo ziyaxatyiswa kwaye zingathunyelwa kwiqela lethu lenkxaso nge-imeyile.

funFacts: Umgaqo-siseko waseMzantsi Afrika uqinisekisa ilungelo lokufikelela kwindawo engathikanga ebomini.
UMzantsi Afrika wakhiqiza ama-tonne angu-108 emfucuzweni ngo-2011, apho ama-tonne angu-59 efumaneka njengemfucuza jikelele.
Ukuphinda kusetyenziswe ikhenisi ye-aluminium konga amandla anele okusebenzisa ilambu le-100-watt amahora angu-20.

articles.title: Yintoni ukulahleka kwamadoti?
articles.description: Ukulahleka kwamadoti kukususa imfucuza kwindawo yoluntu ngaphandle kwemvume, okonakalisa indalo kunye nempilo yoluntu.

articles.title: Ukulahleka kwamadoti akugcini nje ngokubukeka kabi kodwa kuyingozi
articles.description: Ukulahleka kwamadoti eMzantsi Afrika kubiza i-R350 million ngonyaka ukususwa kwemfucuza engu-180,000 tonne.
